text: Na chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na chattapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 57. I will not teach Dhamma to a person with an umbrella in his hand who is not ill: a training to be observed.
๕๗. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่แสดงธรรมแก่บุคคลไม่ใช่ผู้เจ็บไข้มีร่มในมือ”
57. I shall not teach Dhamma to one with an umbrella in his hand who is not sick: this is a training to be done.
